product_name: Benchmade Folding Knife Tool Kit with Sharpener
long_description: The Benchmade Folding Knife tool kit provides everything you need to fine-tune your Benchmade folding knife's blade tension, remove and replace a pocket clip or simply check for loose screws. Kit includes 12 tools, plus a blade sharpener and a carry case.
short_description: The Benchmade Folding Knife tool kit provides everything you need to fine-tune your Benchmade folding knife's blade tension, remove and replace a pocket clip or simply check for loose screws.
